trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Tooele
There were no other sightings in Tooele on or around September 2nd 2013
Summary: Saw bright cylindrical light through night vision scope and then saw naked eye dim red light with naked eye
divs: Sighting DetailsWe recently moved to a house with a nice porch so we've been spending more time outside at night sky watching more then we used to before we had a nice covered porch to sit on and sky watch, it was late and there were dogs behind our house and I got out a night vision scope to see into the dark to see what the dogs were barking at and saw nothing until I looked at the tree tops and saw a long white light through the night vision scope I didn't see anything so I looked through the night vision scope again and saw a long white light again so I stoop up and so did my wife and then we could see a dim red glowing craft, it rose slightly and slowly higher and then proceeded to move towards the east, so we tracked it for a few minutes and it went behind bigger thicker trees so my wife went off the porch to see if she could see it more when it came from behind the trees and she did for a few moments and then it just disappeared from sight and we no longer saw the craft after that
